DOC.brief_summary: Determine degree striatal D2 receptor occupancy induce OPC-34712 differenht dose level healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Positron Emission Tomagraphy ( PET ) Study Following Single Oral Dose OPC-34712
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive dose study medication undergo PET scan 4 hr 23.5 hour post dose . Subjects remain clinic Day-1 Day 7 PK sample collection safety monitoring . Subjects return clinic Day 10 follow-up safety assessment .
DOC.criteria: Males nonchild bear potential female 18 45 year age , inclusive . BMI 19 32 kg/m2 , inclusive . Condition history may present safety concern subject interfere outcome variable . History current drug alcohol abuse , hepatitis , AIDS , drug allergy . Use prescription , overthecounter , herbal medication , vitamin supplement within 14 day antibiotic within 30 day . Use tobacco product daily exposue second hand smoke . Blood pressure high 140/90 mmHg low 100/50 mmHg : heart rate outside 40 90 beats/minute . History serious mental disorder .
